Body:
"""
        Test that the right error is raised when an error occurs during the
        key wrapping process.
        """
engine = crypto.CryptographyEngine()
args = (b'', enums.WrappingMethod.ENCRYPT, enums.BlockCipherMode.
    NIST_KEY_WRAP, b'')
self.assertRaises(exceptions.CryptographicFailure, engine.wrap_key, *args)
